channel.title: [PI] Add animations?

item.title: [PI] Add animations?
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

I added all the rite ints into the animation.java and added the model to a few different locations and client run fines, but when i use it in the game my character turns invisible, the npc turns invisible if i add it to it and the pnpc command, once im in the form of the npc and try the animation it still doesnt work. here is one of my intâ€™s do i have to use model dump?

[code]
anims[6326] = new Animation();
anims[6326].anInt352 = 36;
anims[6326].anInt360 = 66;
